name: StreamersCorner
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Follow the latest news and breaking news in the world of live streaming within Alexa’s Flash Briefing.

Get daily updates about what's new on big streaming platforms like Twitch and youtubes, as well as big moves from companies like streamlabs, mobcrush, restream and more

If you want to be the next Ninja, Pokimane or Dr Disrespect you need to keep up to date with the latest news on livestreaming sites like Twitch and Facebook gaming. These top tier Twitch streamers didn't get where they are by luck, they pay attention to streaming news, tips and advice to keep updated on what's happening in the world of streaming

In this Flash Briefing, Old School Stickam livestreamer Sam Proof, brings you the latest news, tips and advice for the biggest platforms like Twitch or the ones to watch like Dlive.

Find out when Twitch, Dlive, Mixer, Facebook gaming release new rules or features.
Keep up to date on the latest tricks and versions of OBS, Xsplit or streamlabs obs!

IHas the Logitech C920 quadrupled in price? Find out when it's on Sale or what other cams are worth using!



After enabling this skill, say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move Streamers Corner to the top of your news brief!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
